stork.module.http

Class HTTPResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • stork.feather.Resource<HTTPSession,HTTPResource>
      • stork.module.http.HTTPResource

  • public class HTTPResource
extends Resource<HTTPSession,HTTPResource>
    Stores the requested full Path, and state information of the connection. It creates HTTPResource.HTTPTap instances.
    See Also:
    Resource}

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HTTPResource.HTTPTap
      This can be considered as a specific download task for the request from a HTTPResource.
